page.title: 04Recreation in Heolgerrig.
page.content: Heolgerrig is a small village which has very few leisure facilities.At the top of the village is a small peice of land where a climbing frame, two swings and a bench are placed,but it is only suitable for the younger children.There are also two pubs and a Socail Club where adults go to drink, play snooker,pool or darts.A weight watchers club is held in Shirley Gardens weekly. Every child who wants to go swimming ,play sport or dance etc has to travel from Heolgerrig to where the activity is held.Rhydycar Leisure Centre is the main attraction.You can play virtually any indoor sport there. Heolgerrig school is used for activities also.There is a needle work class,various committee meetings,and sometimes summer fetes are held in the school yard.
